name: Autumn's End
description:
Autumn's End is a narrative focused point and click adventure game about boxes, bones, and childhood homes.

It's Amber's last day before her move to the Big City and she's starting to see her childhood home in a different light.

She's supposed to be helping her older sister finish packing, but she wants to take in the sights one last time before she goes.

She soon finds that her hometown isn't as uneventful as she once thought it to be...

Explore the Suburbs on a calm Autumn Afternoon
  • Uncover the Horse's Secret!
  • Become Knowledgeable in the inner workings of the Postal Service
  • Take photos! (For the memories)
  • Finally learn about Erlenmeyer Flasks and their use in Titration
  • Talk to a Rat!
